title: Rotogo Game App
summary: Documented how pairing with large language models unlocked my first end-to-end app build—from prompts to deployment—while translating AI output into shippable product flows.
highlights: Prompt engineering for usable front-end code
Iterative UX/UI refinements guided by AI feedback
Version control and shipping with Netlify
Launched a live mobility prototype in one month

image.alt: Rotogo hero showcasing the AI-assisted case study
